text: Nunzia Amato (born 1996) is an Italian actress, model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Mondo Italia 2018. She represented Italy at the Miss World 2018 pageant. == Life and career == Amato was born in San Gennaro Vesuviano and raised in Naples. She is studying first year of Law, but dreams of becoming an actress and model. ==Pageantry== ===Miss Mondo Italia 2018=== Amato was crowned as Miss Mondo Italia 2018 pageant. She succeeded outgoing Miss Mondo Italia 2017 and Miss World 2017 Top 40 semifinalists Conny Notarstefano. ===Miss World 2018=== Amato will now represent Italy at Miss World 2018 pageant in Sanya, China. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Miss World 2018 delegates Category:Actresses from Naples Category:Italian actresses Category:Italian female models Category:Italian beauty pageant winners
title: Nunzia Amato
